name: Polygon Race
description:
Somewhere in a minimalist world there is a minimalistic racing with regular cars - only things that matters.

Polygon Race is an arcade car game with minimalist graphics. Your task is not touching the cones, get to the finish line or collect the flags for a certain time. Be careful not to crash the car. Will you make it to the finish line on time?

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Beautiful graphics
- Pleasant music
